Body:
"""
        Test that an InvalidField error is raised during the encoding of a
        SplitKey object when the object is missing the key block field.
        """
split_key = secrets.SplitKey(split_key_parts=4, key_part_identifier=1,
    split_key_threshold=2, split_key_method=enums.SplitKeyMethod.
    POLYNOMIAL_SHARING_GF_2_8)
stream = utils.BytearrayStream()
args = stream,
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'The SplitKey object is missing the KeyBlock field.', split_key.write,
    *args)
